articles.title: Watch: Daughter of Putin critic Alexey Navalny describes father's imprisonment in Russia - CNN Video
articles.description: Dasha Navalnaya, the daughter of imprisoned Russian opposition leader Alexey Navalny, speaks with CNN's Jim Sciutto about the conditions her father faces after he was transferred to a maximum-security prison.

articles.title: Ex-Trump aide says Trump admitted privately that he lost the election - CNN Video
articles.description: Alyssa Farah Griffin, a former White House aide under President Trump, says that she heard Trump admit privately that he lost the 2020 election to Joe Biden.

articles.author: Kevin Liptak, CNN
articles.title: Biden says he's nearing decisions on gas tax holiday and student loans as he tries to tame costs
articles.description: President Joe Biden said Monday he hopes to decide soon whether to support a temporary pause in the federal gasoline tax and is nearing a decision on student loan relief as he looks to ease the burden of high prices on Americans.

articles.author: Analysis by Chris Cillizza, CNN Editor-at-large
articles.title: Analysis: The Texas Republican Party convention was really, um, something
articles.description: For the first time in four years, Texas Republicans met in person at their state party convention over the weekend. And boy, did they make up for lost time.

articles.title: Texas GOP adopts resolution rejecting 2020 election results

articles.title: What's open, what's closed on Juneteenth
articles.description: This year marks the second year Juneteenth will be observed as a federal holiday.

articles.author: Helen Regan, Andrew Raine, Amy Woodyatt, Sana Noor Haq, Ed Upright
articles.title: Russia's war in Ukraine
articles.description: Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky said Ukraine should expect 'greater hostile activity' from Russia as the European Union considers whether the country should be formally considered for candidate status. Follow live updates here.
articles.content:
Two American volunteer fighters for Ukraine were taken into detention by Russian-backed separatists in Donetsk after being captured by Russian forces last week, according to Russian state media.

articles.author: Dean Obeidallah
articles.title: Opinion: Republicans in Texas just voted to reject democracy
articles.description: The Texas Republican Convention rejected the outcome of a democratic election, supported bigotry toward the LGBTQ community and imposed far-right beliefs on others by seeking to have them enshrined into law, writes Dean Obeidallah.
